description.p: The batteries included fork of slskd with 24+ new features: decentralized pods, content validation, swarm downloads, DHT mesh networking, auto-replace, wishlist, security hardening.

ul.li: Auto-replace stuck downloads - Automatically finds and switches to working sources
Wishlist/background search - Never miss rare content with automated searches
Smart source ranking - Intelligent scoring based on speed, queue, and history
Tabbed browsing - Browse multiple users simultaneously with persistent state
User notes & ratings - Color-coded ratings and persistent notes for users
Push notifications - Ntfy and Pushover support for messages and mentions
Multi-select folder downloads - Download multiple folders with checkbox selection
Advanced search filters - Visual filter editor with bitrate, duration, file size
PWA/mobile support - Install as standalone app on iOS/Android
Plus: Delete files on disk, block users, save filters, chat improvements, and more
Decentralized pod communities - Private micro-communities over mesh overlay with DHT discovery
Content validation - Byzantine consensus & proof-of-storage with cryptographic commitments
Multi-source swarm downloads - Download files from multiple peers simultaneously with SHA-256 verification
DHT mesh networking - BitTorrent DHT peer discovery with TLS-encrypted mesh overlay
Security hardening - CSRF protection, NetworkGuard rate limiting, PathGuard traversal prevention
MusicBrainz integration - Metadata enrichment, library health scanning, AcoustID fingerprinting
Service fabric - Generic mesh service layer for decentralized applications

description.p: Modern web UI for the Soulseek network. Drop-in replacement for slskd, preserves existing configuration.
Pod-Scoped VPN and Advanced Networking Release.
This major release introduces enterprise-grade VPN capabilities and comprehensive networking features for secure, private decentralized community services.

ul.li: Pod-Scoped VPN: Secure private networking between trusted community members with encrypted tunnels
Mesh Overlay Network: Decentralized peer discovery and community coordination
Anonymous Transports: Tor, I2P, WebSocket, HTTP tunnel, Obfs4, and Meek protocol support
Privacy Layer: Traffic analysis protection with message padding, timing obfuscation, and batching
Enterprise Security: Certificate pinning, rate limiting, comprehensive threat mitigation
Enhanced Web UI: Modern interface for VPN configuration and community management
Content Moderation: Peer reputation system and content filtering
Multi-Source Delivery: Efficient peer-to-peer content distribution from multiple sources
